sentences.english: But the hair shirt is not the critical technology.
sentences.chinese: 实行苦行生活并非关键技术。

sentences.english: What need is there of penance if God is worshipped with love?
sentences.chinese: 如果用爱来敬拜神，那么苦行又有何必要？

sentences.english: Others choose lives of asceticism within our cloistered residence halls.
sentences.chinese: 有些人自愿选择住在我们修堂里做苦行主义者。

sentences.english: Rabia went into the desert to pray and became an ascetic.
sentences.chinese: 随后拉比尔走进沙漠祈祷，从此成为苦行者。

sentences.english: I shall never be an ascetic.
sentences.chinese: 我将永不会做一个苦行者。

sentences.english: Fakirs can put a needle fight through an arm, and feel no pain .
sentences.chinese: 苦行僧能把针穿过一只胳膊而感觉不到疼痛。

sentences.english: He performed severe penance for many years to gain enough power to become the king of the three worlds.
sentences.chinese: 他苦行多年，获得了足够的功力而成为了三界的国王。

sentences.english: Another penance was the drinking of milk.
sentences.chinese: 另一桩苦行就是饮用牛奶。

sentences.english: For many births you tried to propitiate Me through austerities.
sentences.chinese: 你的很多世都设法通过苦行来劝解我。

sentences.english: Can one receive the grace of God without austerities ?
sentences.chinese: 没有苦行能得到神的恩典吗？

sentences.english: After six years of strict discipline, he finally realized his dream of full enlightenment on the eighth day of the twelfth lunar month.
sentences.chinese: 后经六年苦行，终于在腊月初八这一天悟道成佛。

sentences.english: Throughout history power has been the vice of the ascetic.
sentences.chinese: 从古至今，权力都是苦行者的罪恶嗜好。

sentences.english: A dervish whose actions include ecstatic dancing and whirling.
sentences.chinese: 活动包括狂喜地跳舞和旋转的苦行僧。

sentences.english: I shall never be an ascetic if she does not take the vow with me.
sentences.chinese: 我将永不会做一个苦行僧，如果她不和我一同去受戒。

sentences.english: Liars of terrible devotion, caverns of virgins, ferocious places.
sentences.chinese: 残忍的苦行窟，处女们的火坑，蛮不讲理的地方。

sentences.english: What is the use of penance if God is not worshipped with love?
sentences.chinese: 如果用爱来敬拜神，那么苦行又有何必要？
